name: Ignore
matches: ^[\w'\-]+ is bouncing around acrobatically\.$
A songbird is perched upon his shoulder.
A songbird is perched upon her shoulder.
He has sworn vengeance upon those who would slay him.
She has sworn vengeance upon those who would slay her.
He is bathed in the glorious protection of decaying flesh.
She is bathed in the glorious protection of decaying flesh.
He is enhancing his ocular prowess.
She is enhancing her ocular prowess.
^She has a small [\w'\-]+ bonus lasting another \d+ days\, \d+ hours and \d+ minutes\.$
^He has a small [\w'\-]+ bonus lasting another \d+ days\, \d+ hours and \d+ minutes\.$
^He has been granted a bonus to [\w'\-]+ regeneration\.$
^She has been granted a bonus to [\w'\-]+ regeneration\.$
He will lose less experience in the event of death.
She will lose less experience in the event of death.
He has been granted the ability to levitate above the ground.
She has been granted the ability to levitate above the ground.
He has been granted the boon of travelling to mutual allies.
She has been granted the boon of travelling to mutual allies.
The vitality of the boar is energising him.
The vitality of the boar is energising her.
^(He|She) is benefitting from a \d+\% bonus to critical hits\.$
^(He|She) is blocking the exit [\w'\-]+\.$
